Convenience functions to facilitate installation and management of required resources for __*Biostatistics*__ course unit (*BS-2020*).


# Install

To install this package from GitHub:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!require(remotes)) {install.packages("remotes")}
remotes::install_github("mokymai/bs")
```
